QuestData.Title: Myzerian's Head
QuestData.Description: The head of one of Deathwing's most formidable black dragons is now in your possession.$b$bWhile many in Azeroth would pay dearly for such an artifact, something tells you that it belongs in a museum for all to see and remember.$b$bHarrison Jones is likely to have the proper connections.$b$bSullah would certainly be happy to deliver it to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Myzerian's Head to Sullah at Sullah's Sideshow.
QuestData.RewardText: Quite an accomplishment, $n.$b$bI'll be certain that this gets to Harrison when his expedition here is concluded.
